text: Amorphospermum is a genus of plants in the family Sapotaceae described as a genus in 1870.Mueller, Ferdinand Jacob Heinrich von. 1870. Fragmenta Phytographiæ Australiæ 7: 112-114 in LatinTropicos, Amorphospermum F. Muell. There is only one accepted species, Amorphospermum antilogum, native to Queensland, New South Wales, and Papua New Guinea.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ;formerly included now in other genera: Elaeoluma Englerophytum Niemeyera Pycnandra Synsepalum ==References== Category:Sapotaceae Category:Monotypic Ericales genera Category:Flora of Australia Category:Flora of New Guinea Category:Sapotaceae genera
title: Amorphospermum
